name: Hi, I'm Lucas
presentation: I am a Computer Science student and web developer in training, focusing on the JavaScript ecosystem, studying and developing projects with JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, and Next.js.
passion: Passionate developer with expertise in building scalable web applications and creating innovate solutions.
work_experiences: Frontend Trainee Developer at Property and Materials Management Division of the Municipality of Ubá.
desc_experiences: Responsible for frontend development and the creation and integration of REST APIs.
document_manager_description: I participated in an extension project for the Computer Science course with the goal of developing document management and control software, aimed at optimizing the processes of the Assets and Materials Administration Division of the Municipality of Ubá.
crypto_vision_description: I developed a web application for real-time cryptocurrency monitoring, displaying updated prices, price fluctuation charts, and detailed information about each asset.
moodflix_description: I developed an intuitive movie viewing and recommendation system.
ecommerce_description: I developed an e-commerce platform as a practical project to apply web development concepts and understand the workflow of an e-commerce application.
